div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1005 Aleksandrovka, Belozerka raion, Kherson oblast, Ukraine, 1929 Burial: 5th-4th cent. B.C.? Contents: 27 AE Olbia: 25 AE (type unknown) Istrus: 2 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 7) Disposition: museum material lost during war Fabritsius, Arkheologicheskaia karta Pricherno- mor'ia Ukrainskoi SSR, issue 1 (Kiev, 1951), p. 106 (inaccurate)
